snippet.title: Nightly News
snippet.description: This just in: Dressing up and putting on a news show is a great way to get crafty and practice public speaking.

snippet.title: Website Review: Uncle Jay Explains: The News
snippet.description: Sarcastic take on news topics will entertain teens.

snippet.title: TV Review: Onion News Network
snippet.description: Savage satire of cable network news with mature content.

snippet.title: Website Review: eFans
snippet.description: Mostly appropriate content on social sports site.

snippet.title: Game Review: Call of Duty: Black Ops
snippet.description: Superb but violent shooter is definitely for adults only.

snippet.title: Television Review: Nick News with Linda Ellerbee
snippet.description: A must-see news program for teens and tweens.

snippet.title: Television Review: How's Your News?
snippet.description: Disabled reporters seek out news in honest reality show.

snippet.title: Television Review: Teen Kids News
snippet.description: Teens report for teens in lively news show.

snippet.title: Television Review: Chocolate News
snippet.description: Fake news show tackles real racial issues.
